name: MORGENSHTERN: easygame
description:
MORGENSHTERN: easygame - a dynamic fighting game in which you have to fight with different opponents using
martial arts techniques. You are waited by ten interesting fights with absolutely unpredictable opponents.

You need to fight your enemies with various melee techniques. Each subsequent fight is more difficult than the previous one.
Will increase the number and strength of the enemy, but at the same time you'll receive new abilities that will help win a victory.

Use different combat tactics, defend yourself or move away from strikes and attack, successfully choosing moments.

You are waiting for completely different opponents who will try to stand in your way or kill you!
But this isn't a reason to stop, because strong-willed people don't give up!

Features:
-Good music
-Full and realistic graphics
-Unique gameplay, worked out fighting animations.
-Various opponents
-The style of the main character
